Developed with HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Vanilla JavaScript, and Parcel as a bundler. The UI was developed by me through Figma, and the illustrations were taken from open-source libraries.","rollingTetrisDescription":"Rolling Tetris is a variation of the Tetris game where, each time the player eliminates a line containing a special piece, the tetris board is rotated, turning upside down. Along with the game, developed with HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript, we also developed a full-stack platform to host the game.","cookiesDescription":"Digital catalog for a cookie selling business. Developed in Node.js, Express, MySQL, HTML5, and CSS3.","justAnotherTaskManagerDescription":"Task list and Pomodoro Timer. Developed in ReactJS. Dexie.js was used to store the tasks in the Browser's indexedDB, and SASS was used as a CSS preprocessor.","memoryGameDescription":"Themed memory game using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
